abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &Golong; V2 with &AWS;.

section.para: The code examples in this topic show you how to use the &Golong; V2 with &AWS;.

variablelist.para: The examples are divided into the following categories:

listitem.para: Code excerpts that show you how to call individual service functions.
Code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple functions within the same service.
Sample applications that work across multiple &AWS; services.

section.para: Examples

info.title: Single-service actions and scenarios using &Go; V2

abstract.para: The following code examples show how to implement common scenarios and perform individual service actions by using &Go; V2 with &AWS; services.

section.para: The following code examples show how to perform actions and implement common scenarios by using the &Golong; V2 with &AWS; services.
Actions are code excerpts that show you how to call individual service functions.
Scenarios are code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple functions within the same service.
Services

abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &Golong; V2 with &DDB;.

section.para: The following code examples show you how to perform actions and implement common scenarios by using the &Golong; V2 with &DDB;.
Actions are code excerpts that show you how to call individual &DDB; functions.
Scenarios are code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple &DDB; functions.
Each example includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code in context.
The following code example shows how to create a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to delete a &DDB; table.

info.title: Delete an item from a table
info.titleabbrev: Delete an item from a table

section.para: The following code example shows how to delete an item from a &DDB; table.

info.title: Get an item from a table
info.titleabbrev: Get an item from a table

section.para: The following code example shows how to get an item from a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to get information about a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to list &DDB; tables.

info.title: Put an item in a table
info.titleabbrev: Put an item in a table

section.para: The following code example shows how to put an item in a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to query a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to scan a &DDB; table.

info.title: Update an item in a table
info.titleabbrev: Update an item in a table

section.para: The following code example shows how to update an item in a &DDB; table.
The following code example shows how to write a batch of &DDB; items.

info.title: Get started using tables, items, and queries
info.titleabbrev: Get started using tables, items, and queries

section.para: The following code example shows how to:

listitem.para: Create a table that can hold movie data.
Put, get, and update a single movie in the table.
Write movie data to the table from a sample JSON file.
Query for movies that were released in a given year.
Scan for movies that were released in a range of years.
Delete a movie from the table.
Delete the table.

abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &Golong; V2 with &IAM;.

Actions are code excerpts that show you how to call individual &IAM; functions.
Scenarios are code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple &IAM; functions.
Each example includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code in context.

info.title: Create a user and assume a role
info.titleabbrev: Create a user and assume a role

section.para: The following code example shows how to:

listitem.para: Create a user who has no permissions.
Create a role that grants permission to list &S3; buckets for the account.
Add a policy to let the user assume the role.
Assume the role and list &S3; buckets using temporary credentials.
Delete the policy, role, and user.

abstract.para: Code examples that show how to use &Golong; V2 with &KMS;.

section.para: The following code examples show you how to perform actions and implement common scenarios by using the &Golong; V2 with &KMS;.
Actions are code excerpts that show you how to call individual &KMS; functions.
Scenarios are code examples that show you how to accomplish a specific task by calling multiple &KMS; functions.
Each example includes a link to GitHub, where you can find instructions on how to set up and run the code in context.
The following code example shows how to create an &kms-key-long;.
The following code example shows how to decrypt ciphertext that was encrypted by a &kms-key;.
The following code example shows how to encrypt text using a &kms-key;.

info.title: Recencrypt ciphertext from one key to another
info.titleabbrev: Recencrypt ciphertext from one key to another

section.para: The following code example shows how to reencrypt ciphertext from one &kms-key; to another.
